summary.span: 指定从数字签名的范围内排除的 XPS 的各个部件。

span.span: Specifies the parts of the XPS that are excluded from the range of a digital signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此枚举具有允许其成员值的按位组合 FlagsAttribute。This enumeration has a FlagsAttribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values. 为被指定为从数字签名中排除的部件可以修改不会导致无效签名。Parts that are specified as excluded from the digital signature can be modified without invalidating the signature. 例如，如果文档是由多人签名，则需要 SignatureOrigin 部分第一次签名文档时从签名中排除。For example, if a document is to be signed by more than one person, the SignatureOrigin part needs to be excluded from the signature when the document is first signed. (中指定排除`restrictions`的调用的参数。)如果不排除 SignatureOrigin 部件，任何附加签名使无效的第一个签名者的签名。(Exclusions are specified in the `restrictions` parameter of the call to .) If the SignatureOrigin part is not excluded, any additional signatures invalidate the signature of the first signer. 有关数字签名的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 文章*开放式打包约定的数字签名框架*在[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494)。For more information about digital signatures, see the MSDN article *Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions* available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494). 核心属性和签名源部件的详细信息，请参阅第 3 章的*开放式打包约定*规范下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。For more information on the Core Properties and Signature Origin parts, see Chapter 3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此枚举进行数字签名[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档。The following example shows how to use this enumeration to digitally sign an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
